content.question: Which of the following is equivalent to <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, x times e raised to the fraction x over 2, power, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="x times e raised to the fraction x over 2, power, minus, the indefinite integral of, e raised to the fraction x over 2, power, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 x times e raised to the fraction x over 2, power, minus, the indefinite integral of, 2 times e raised to the fraction x over 2, power, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 x times e raised to the fraction x over 2, power, plus, the indefinite integral of, 2 times e raised to the fraction x over 2, power, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the indefinite integral of x, d x, times, the indefinite integral of, e raised to the fraction x over 2, power, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>⋅</mo><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 x times e raised to the fraction x over 2, power, minus, the indefinite integral of, 2 times e raised to the fraction x over 2, power, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>∫</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the classification of a given expression (e.g., Use the chain rule to find the derivative of a composite function).
